heronarts.lx.control
Class LXVirtualParameter

java.lang.Object
  heronarts.lx.control.LXParameter
      heronarts.lx.control.LXVirtualParameter

public abstract class LXVirtualParameter
extends LXParameter

A virtual parameter is one that wraps or forwards to another real parameter. Typically this is done in situations in which the parameter to forward to varies based on some other contextual action or UI, for instance a virtual knob that maps to whatever pattern is currently active.

Author:
mcslee
